plugin.name: Aardwolf_Text_Substitutions
plugin.author: Fiendish
plugin.description:
This plugin substitutes text with something else.
It does not cross color code boundaries. '#sub {potato} {pants}' will make @Mpotato@Cpants@Rairplane@w become @Mpants@Cpants@Rairplane@w but will not do anything to @Mpot@Yato@Cpants@Rairplane@w because, in this one, the word potato has a color break inside it.
Type "#sub help" or make a syntax mistake for usage details.
